Subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in k8s-cluster (ap-northeast-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The k8s-cluster in the ap-northeast-1 region is experiencing critical resource constraints due to high resource utilization, with CPU usage at 93.19% and memory usage at 95.76%. This is likely caused by increased workload or insufficient resource allocation. All deployed applications and services within the cluster are affected, leading to potential degraded performance, increased latency, or service outages for customers. The issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: k8s-cluster
Region: ap-northeast-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: infrastructure

Metrics:
{
  "cpu_percent": 93.19,
  "memory_percent": 95.76,
  "disk_io_mbps": 491.58,
  "network_io_mbps": 613.53
}

Workaround: Scale up the k8s-cluster resources (CPU and memory) and investigate workload patterns to optimize resource usage. Notify customers about potential service impacts.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.
